mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment ( userIdx, reservIdx, prodIdx, couponUserIdx, paymentType, orderId, paymentTransactionId, paymentMethod, paymentTotal, couponDiscount, pointDiscount, paymentFinal, paymentStatus, paymentDate ) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{reservIdx}, #{prodIdx}, #{couponUserIdx}, #{paymentType}, #{orderId}, #{paymentTransactionId}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentTotal}, #{couponDiscount}, #{pointDiscount}, #{paymentFinal}, 0, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM payment WHERE userIdx = #{userIdx} ORDER BY paymentDate DESC
